data.text: @cobuspienaar Why make Address 3 field a required field. It's not going to prevent the user from omitting street number. A suggestion from support, maybe have a modal with address confirmation "Are you sure this is the correct address". If Address 3 field is required what would the user have filled in there. What if it's a PO box, e.g. PO Box 1234 Cape Town. What would they fill in for address 3 field.
